Password.label: Access Token
Password.help: API token from printer network settings - see README for detailed instructions per printer model

serial.label: Serial number of device
serial.help: Device serial number from printer network settings - required for authentication

useCloudConnection.label: Use Bambu Lab Cloud Connection
useCloudConnection.help: Connect via Bambu Lab Cloud instead of direct MQTT. Requires cloud account credentials.

cloudEmail.label: Cloud Account Email
cloudEmail.help: Your Bambu Lab account email address

octoEverywhereToken.label: OctoEverywhere Auth Token (Optional)
octoEverywhereToken.help: Optional OctoEverywhere token for WebSocket proxy connection

octoEverywhereSecret.label: OctoEverywhere Auth Secret (Optional)
octoEverywhereSecret.help: Optional OctoEverywhere secret for WebSocket proxy connection

getDataFiles.label: Upload g-code file
getDataFiles.help: Here you can upload files, like g-code, to send to the printer
